website_summaries.verdict: A small yet effective polyurethane roller that’s perfect for smaller yards.
pros: Can be pushed or towed via hitch for excellent versatility
Equips neat features like scraper bar and internal support disc despite the low price
Lightweight construction permits easy transporting and storage
Resists rust and comes with an easy-to-use drain plug
cons: Diminutive size and 250-pound tank weight limits its effectiveness somewhat

customer_reviews.title: Awsome product saved a ton of money
customer_reviews.text: So many people complained about this roller ...why ? I found it absolutely fantastic ..did the job great ...and the value was great same roller at home depot and lowes was around $229.00 ..this was a no brainer ..and this size was perfect 18 inches did 3acres I only really had to do 1 but what the hell right ...took me about an hour .. and it looks great ....thank u Amazon for another great item 👍and one more thg if the plug does not stay in .hold the washer wth a screw driver and then turn to tighten ...works perfect
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Quality item that is priced right
customer_reviews.text: It's a good size for rolling sod, at least small areas. I have less than 500 sq. ft., so its perfect. Mine showed up missing the upper handle. It wasn't an open box, it just wasn't packed from the manufacturer. I immediately called the company, and they sent me a handle; 5 days later, of course. It holds water like it should, and doesn't leak through the axle. It's priced right, and very functional. The tow strap and pin can be used, or not. The picture suggests its connected to the handle, but it isn't. By the way, Agri-Fab was cordial about the missing handle, but the delay threw me off schedule about a week.
customer_reviews.author: DD

customer_reviews.title: Pushes and pulls easily when full
customer_reviews.text: Exploded view of parts provided plenty of information to assemble the roller. I filled it a little at a time to see how much effort it took to push or pull it. Eventually I filled it all the way and still had a simple job rolling and turning it. The plug is the type that can be adjusted for tightness by rotating the lever before camming it down. I left the hitch "U" off for manual rolling, which made it clean and injury-free. Did it solve the bumps in the lawn? Well, it will probably take several uses to get the lawn as smooth as I would like.
customer_reviews.author: Vic

customer_reviews.title: Works as designed and good for hand or ATV use.
customer_reviews.text: Works like it should and easy to assemble. I have used it by hand and with an ATV. By hand it is about the most weight an average person could handle safely. On an ATV you shoukd know that you will be leaving ATV tracks behind because this is not wide enough to cover the tracks. Also, you need to be very careful in reverse. The unit wants to turn and bind up in reverse, which can bend the metal if enough force is appled.
customer_reviews.author: PupTop Contributor: Archery

customer_reviews.title: Great item and price
customer_reviews.text: Used this for some sod installs (under 1500 sqft). For fun i then rolled existing lawns and striped them like Yankee Stadium People have posted that it leaked alittle. Not for me so much. But i empty it after every use and unplug while halfway rolling out sod, watering lawn while emptying it.
customer_reviews.author: AP10304

customer_reviews.title: roller
customer_reviews.text: this is 2nd season since I got this for my husband for Christmas and it works good for what we need. it came in box, box held up, came in a timely manner. there wasn't anything wrong with the way it was shipped or anything. satisfied with it big time. I believe he loves it. gives him something to do before he starts to mow. lol. small garden tractor, he gets to get it out and play.
customer_reviews.author: n/a...

customer_reviews.title: I rate based on value compared to price and this is a winner!
customer_reviews.text: First a small criticism. As others have pointed out the plug is lame and it leaks. Ok, no big deal but it is distracting. The good news is this item was shipped super fast by the seller, easy to quickly assemble. You need the patience to fill with water as it takes a while and I am not a patient person. he he.... Just the right size and weight to do a great job. My little riding mower pulls it no problem and I did not have a problem turning. (it will be a problem if I was trying a zero turn, but I did not need that. I highly recommend this product and this seller!
customer_reviews.author: Rod Mael

customer_reviews.title: attachment angle too wide, perforrated hole after one use
customer_reviews.text: I cleaned my yard up almost to a neurotic level before using it and it still ended up with a hole in it. Also, the attachment angle is too wide as it will inhibit you from taking all but the widest of turns or rub on your back wheels. I would not recommend this product to anyone who has an acre or less with which the turn radius you have to use is far too wide to make it practical or useful. Also... the leaking would prohibit me from recommending it to anyone at all. bad investment
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Poor hitch design. Simple 10 minute assembly.
customer_reviews.text: Simple to assemble. Roller quality and material of the frame is good. But the design of the hitch is poor. We had to modify it to use. Unless you never need to make a turn the frame will rub the rear tires with only a slight turn.
customer_reviews.author: Teri Baughman

customer_reviews.title: Arrived used and missing parts.
customer_reviews.text: Part arrived with water in the barrel, metal posts outside the barrel were rusted, missing crossbeam, liquid residue all over barrel and remaining parts. No idea where this happened from, be it amazon, or MFG.... but I do not appreciate getting a used piece of merchandise for the price of new. Could have gotten this on craigslist for half the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Paul S

customer_reviews.title: this is a lifesaver
customer_reviews.text: this thing is a lifesaver. I have used other ones before but they're very clunky, but this one is not clunky at all it does not stick. Very easy to clean. Very easy to drain the water out of it once you're done. What you make storage of this product very convenient. Winfield completely with water, it's about 250 lb.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Worked for what we needed
customer_reviews.text: Quick shipping. Easy to assemble and easy to use. Our yard is on an incline. We needed to level a huge area for an 18 foot pool. This worked perfect to compact and level the yard. I did notice the water started leaking after a few uses.
customer_reviews.author: CLD

customer_reviews.title: Well engineered and solidly built
customer_reviews.text: The roller was easy to assemble, and it works well for the purpose I intended - flattening mole runs in my yard. When filled with water it weighs around 300 lbs, which I can push around the yard without too much effort, and it is adequate to flatten the mole runs. Construction is solid and well thought-out. The filler stop is effective and easy to use - similar to the drain plugs used in small boat transoms. Bolts have a neoprene insert that keeps them snug. I am very pleased with this purchase and recommend this unit highly.
customer_reviews.author: John Peck

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: This is exacting what I was looking for, easy to assemble, works great, and stores in the garage or shed with ease. I like the fact that you filled it with water, then you can use the water in your garden, no waste.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen A Moffett

customer_reviews.title: Stopper started popping out after <15 minutes use
customer_reviews.text: I have a very small yard and just wanted to roll it to flatten mole tunnels now that the moles are gone. However, in less than 15 minutes use the stopper would no longer stay in - as the roller turned and the stopper was on the bottom (maximum water pressure against it), it would start pushing out. Pretty quickly it would pop out at every turn. Pretty useless if the stopper pops out and the water starts draining on every turn.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Etchieson

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect for our patio project. We couldn’t use a vibrating tamper on the pavers, so we purchased this. It worked great and we can’t wait to use it on our yard in the spring!
customer_reviews.author: McPaddy

customer_reviews.title: Good roller!
customer_reviews.text: It's a good roller. Pretty much easy to use. But after three (3) uses, I can't tighten the plug and it leaks. The leak isn't that bad that I've decided to keep it.
customer_reviews.author: Luv4 USA

customer_reviews.title: Works good, not too heavy for zero turn
customer_reviews.text: We use this to knock down the mole runs, so we can detect which are active. Works pretty good, when at full weight. Zero turn pulls it just fine
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Flattens nearly everything we roll it over. Simple to ...
customer_reviews.text: Flattens nearly everything we roll it over. Simple to use, fill it with water, roll it, drain it, and store it. Very lightweight when empty.
customer_reviews.author: Jackyl764

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: This works great! The first one we got was damaged, but we had no problems getting it replaced and have been using this a lot!
customer_reviews.author: D. Bellows

customer_reviews.title: I guess it'll work well if the soil is dry ...
customer_reviews.text: I guess it'll work well if the soil is dry, otherwise, on wet soil, the roller will pick up the mud and will seize the roller and get stuck. Thought It'll be a breeze to work with but it's tougher than what others are saying. Not a problem with the product, just a realization.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Wynn

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the price. Wish I had more lawn to put in.
customer_reviews.text: It's easy to fill and the plug doesn't leak. You adjust the weight by adding or subtracting water inside. It's also easy to drain afterwards.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis L Hancock

customer_reviews.title: Well made and simple design
customer_reviews.text: Easy to fill and drain can fill to desired weigh for like new grass. John
customer_reviews.author: John N.

customer_reviews.title: Not heavy enough.
customer_reviews.text: While it’s a well made product, 250lbs isn’t really enough weight to flatten a lawn.
customer_reviews.author: Jmcrash

customer_reviews.title: Instructions on assembly are a little Hard to understand
customer_reviews.text: We had breezeways/pathways put in our yard, unfortunately the person doing the job fell ill and couldn’t finish,All that was needed was to pack it down, this roller worked great for that job! Completely waited down, my 15-year-old daughter can use it.
customer_reviews.author: Bowhunter

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Easy to put together and no problems with it
customer_reviews.author: Tharpe

customer_reviews.title: Stoked so far
customer_reviews.text: Super stoked. Where I live I couldn't find this piece of equipment anywhere. Honestly, I'm pretty surprised that I was able to get it so quickly and at such a reasonable price. Everything arrived fine and I assembled it in less than 30 minutes while watching NBA playoffs. Once it was all together it seems to be just what I ordered. I should be able to try it out here in the next few weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck Inman

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Used it yesterday after putting down grass seed. It seemed to do the job. It does leak a little, but not enough to hold up the job. You have to make sure to make wide turns. Overall as expected.
customer_reviews.author: JB1959

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Good enough that my gardener likes to borrow it for other jobs -still works well.
customer_reviews.author: James (So Cal)

customer_reviews.title: Well-built easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble I'm 63 . I filled my drum with water had no problem pushing it back and forth. No leaks
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: It does a great job for its value. It's not too big & it flattens my yard well. I agree the hitch needs to be longer to make it super easy to use. I do have problems with the plug coming out. I will need to contact the manufacturer for a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Robyn Danku

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't do well on a lawn tractor.
customer_reviews.text: Great if you don't ever have to turn. The arm is to wide and short. It hits the rear tires.
customer_reviews.author: Calvin B

customer_reviews.title: Simple!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product. Designed as expected. Will take a few extra spots to level the lawn as desired but super easy to assemble, fill, drain and use on my tractor. Haven’t tried pushing by hand.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Fleming

customer_reviews.title: worked well
customer_reviews.text: early thoughts on the product as I have only had it for a few weeks. Item put together easily and feels sturdy. worked well and serves its purpose. So all around satisfied so far
customer_reviews.author: Tenny E

customer_reviews.title: Weak handle design.
customer_reviews.text: 1st time using the bolts broke off and the attachment to the drum bent. The drum is fine but the bar attachment is cheap and can't handle the load when turning. I am going to keep it and try to rig something up so I can tow it behind my lawn tractor. NOT HAPPY!
customer_reviews.author: Edward Brady

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Good basic lawn roller. Too early to tell for durability but work's as described.
customer_reviews.author: scotty k

customer_reviews.title: Nice Roller
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for my putting green. Better then renting glad I have one for future projects.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler W. Wichman

customer_reviews.title: but seems to work fine. It was assembled by two 13-year-olds
customer_reviews.text: Either my yard is a little too firm, or this item isn't heavy enough. The bung is a little awkward, but seems to work fine. It was assembled by two 13-year-olds.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Made of material that won't rust!
customer_reviews.text: I liked the fact that this won't rust out like our old metal one. We used it to roll our lawn where moles had made it hard to walk.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Plug doesn't hold water
customer_reviews.text: Foiled by a cheap $1 Chinese plug. Seriously? The plug doesn't hold in place due to a manufacture defect. If only they spent a few more cents it would all be worthwhile. Instead- it's a hassle.
customer_reviews.author: jk

customer_reviews.title: Works good, but you have to drain it out after ...
customer_reviews.text: Works good, but you have to drain it out after you use it or it will develop a flat spot. After you drain it hang it up on hooks.
customer_reviews.author: wolfman jack

customer_reviews.title: Works fine except that it developed 2 leaks after first use
customer_reviews.text: Works fine except that it developed 2 leaks after first use. Small leaks but still leaks. Contacted agri fab but have not heard back from them after 1 week.
customer_reviews.author: Paul McKay

customer_reviews.title: easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: it was easy to put together and it didn't leak. I only gave it 4 stars cause, I should have gotten the bigger one. it did what I wanted so I'm happy.
customer_reviews.author: gene martin

customer_reviews.title: Leaks
customer_reviews.text: It does what it's supposed to do, but it leaks a lot, so you have to continue to fill it up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: easy enough to fill
customer_reviews.text: easy enough to fill. can push around with just one person if necessary, which for me it was. can be easily hooked up to a small tractor in the future. seems like good thick poly material that should last.
customer_reviews.author: Elliot Hogan

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we are looking for.
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to install and it seems easy to use. It will get the job done.
customer_reviews.author: mmnn

customer_reviews.title: holy roller
customer_reviews.text: water while you roll! came with a pin-sized hole in it. probably not an issue if you plan to fill with sand.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: DONT GET IT
customer_reviews.text: Cheap plastic do not get it too small don’t think it is metal
customer_reviews.author: Lauralee M. Sprague

customer_reviews.title: Good Roller
customer_reviews.text: I bought this roller for regular maintenance of my Bocce Court. It was very easy to assemble and fills easily with water. The plug seems well made and hopefully won't leak water in the future. Because of the rounded edge, it does not leave marks when turning. I find it very easy to maneuver but because of its weight you must use caution near any slopes or hills.
customer_reviews.author: T. A. Walsh

customer_reviews.title: the side wall were too weak, filled it up ...
customer_reviews.text: the side wall were too weak, filled it up and they popped out and started leaking. didn't even get to use it once.
customer_reviews.author: D. Frandsen

customer_reviews.title: roll'n on
customer_reviews.text: i should have bought one years ago! i have been renting one whenever i needed it and could find one, then take it back and pay rent at $25.00 a day plus my time and gas. this roller is made better than some and equal to any i have ever used. the price was great and my wife uses it "for a chair". thanks pap.. in sc
customer_reviews.author: marjorie spears

customer_reviews.title: Missing piece
customer_reviews.text: I bought this back in October 2017. I just assembled it on Monday and I just noticed that I am missing a part (the handle)
customer_reviews.author: Haike

customer_reviews.title: ... Agri-Fab lawn roller functioned well and set up was easy.
customer_reviews.text: The Agri-Fab lawn roller functioned well and set up was easy.
customer_reviews.author: David McKinney

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for what is supposed to do.
customer_reviews.text: It is easy to assemble and easy to use. That is all you can ask for a product like this.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby L. Whitney Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Does job after modification
customer_reviews.text: I assembled this roller the day I received it and when I tested it, it rolled fine. However, after two weeks of sitting, the sides bulged out. When I then try to use it, it couldn't roll because the bulges jammed on the handle. I then dissassembled it and added 5 washers to each side of the drums shaft, so that the handle could now clear the bulges. Once modified, it worked fine.
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: Garden Roller
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, and to fill with water. At full water capacity roller will be difficult to use without assistance from sit-on mower or small tractor. Happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: DAL

customer_reviews.title: Agri-Fab Lawn Roller
customer_reviews.text: An excellent item. Very light when empty and easy to use when filled with water. It does a fantastic job and is not subject to rust as my previous roller. Well worth the cost.
customer_reviews.author: David S Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Roller
customer_reviews.text: Nice roller for a small yard (15,000-20,000 Square Feet) if your going to push the roller. Roll after a good rain with the roller full. Nice to use after seeding to set the seeds from being blown or washed away. I would rate this roller 5 out of 5, as a push roller.
customer_reviews.author: R. Pittrof

customer_reviews.title: Lawn Roller
customer_reviews.text: Roller works fine. The plug for the water fill is defective. The lever tightener does not secure the plug
customer_reviews.author: Frederic J. Morton Jr.

customer_reviews.title: After this there will be other uses for this roller and I am sure I will be pleased with the results
customer_reviews.text: Presently I am cultivating a 4' x 100' strip for reseeding. I wanted a roller to insure the soil would be compacted properly. I am in the process of doing this now and the unit is functioning very well. After this there will be other uses for this roller and I am sure I will be pleased with the results.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander J. Bauer

customer_reviews.title: Agri fab great products
customer_reviews.text: We have three piece of equipment from this company and each one has met our needs . This one still in box but sure it will be as good as others
customer_reviews.author: Deborah L. Hitchcock

customer_reviews.title: poor quality seams
customer_reviews.text: Had a small pin hole leak in the seam around bung. Jb weld fixed it. Would have returned if not such a hassle to disassemble and box up.
customer_reviews.author: Sid

product_meta.title: Agri-Fab 45-0267 18- by 24-Inch Poly Push/Tow Lawn Roller,Black
product_meta.description:
The Agri-Fab, 18” x 24” Poly Push/Tow Behind Lawn Roller #45-0267 will help restore a lawn to its smooth appearance after flooding or eliminate frost heaves caused by freezing and thawing. The drum can hold up to 250 pounds of water or sand. Water is the preferred choice when filling the drum as you will be able to empty the water out at the end of the rolling season, which makes storing the unit easier. For users who prefer to fill with sand, Agri-Fab recommends filling the drum only halfway full. The drum has a removable one-inch plug, which makes filling and draining easy. The poly roller comes with a scraper bar that removes any debris stuck to the drum. The roller’s drum is made out of a sturdy polyethylene, which resists dents, rust, and weather damage. This roller will last you for years to come with proper care and use. All Agri-Fab, products come with a 3-year limited .

AMAZON.COM
The Agri-Fab poly push/tow lawn roller is ideal for flattening uneven ground caused by moles or frost-heaving, and for packing down newly sown seed or sod. It can be filled with up to 250 pounds of water. Weighing less than 40 pounds without water, this roller is light enough to be pushed by hand. It features a removable hitch for push or pull operation and a removable drain plug. A well-designed channel bar right above the roller knocks off excess dirt. The roller is made of smooth-finished plastic for even and consistent flattening. The poly drum resists rust. This push/tow lawn roller comes with Agri-Fab's 1-year warranty.
feature_bullets: CAPACITY: 400 lbs. when filled with water
STORAGE: Lightweight when empty, for easy transport and storage
ASSEMBLY: Some assembly required; a video instruction guide is available to assist with the assembly process
OPERATION: Push/Tow feature; Drain/Fill plug empties easily and fills with a regular garden hose

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars159 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
